definition: A savory and comforting dish typically made by simmering poultry and vegetables together, often used as a remedy for common colds or as a nourishing meal.

examples.english: I like to eat chicken soup.

examples.german: Meine Oma kocht die beste Hühnersuppe.
examples.english: My grandma makes the best chicken soup.
Chicken soup is good for colds.
